courseDetails.title: Unity Game Development: Beginner to Pro
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn to Create Games with Unity & C#
courseDetails.longDescription:
Unity Game Development: Beginner to Pro course as the name suggests caters to the students or professionals keen on learning Game Development with or without any prior experience and knowledge on the subject. The course is designed in such a way that any student could easily learn to create a game at the end of the course.

Here is the outline of the course 'Unity Game Development: Beginner to Pro' :

  1. Introduction to the course.

  2. Introduction to Unity & installation

    • Configure Visual studio with Unity.

    • Create a C# script & understand the structure of the script

    • Print 'Hello World' in the Unity console

  3. Operators, Data types & variables in C#

    • Arithmetic operator

    • Relational operator

    • Logical operator

    • Conditional operator

  4. Control flow statements

    • Decision making statements

    • Switch statements

    • Looping statements

  5. Collections in C#

    • List

    • Sorted List

    • Dictionary

    • Queue

    • Arraylist

    • Hashtable

    • Stack

  6. Introduction to UI in Unity

    • Canvas

    • Text

    • Image

    • Button

    • ScrollView

    • InputField

    • Slider

    • Anchor

  7. Introduction to Unity Events

    • Event functions

    • Custom functions

  8. Delegates in Unity

    • Single - cast delegate

    • Multi - cast delegate

    • Delegate Events

  9. Introduction to Unity Input system

    • Keyboard Inputs

    • Mouse Inputs

    • Axis Inputs

  10. Rigidbody & Collisions

    • Introduction to Rigidbody

    • Applying Rigidbody to the GameObject

    • Creating a floor in the game

    • Move a Sphere gameobject using Rigidbody and Inputs

    • Introduction to Colliders & collisions

    • Create a scene to detect collisions - 1

    • Create a scene to detect collisions - 2

  11. Animations in Unity

    • Introduction to Animations

    • 2D Sprite Animation - part 1

    • 2D Sprite Animation - part 2

    • 2D Sprite Animation - part 3

    • 2D Sprite Animation - part 4

    • Animating a 3D character - part 1

    • Animating a 3D character - part 2

    • Animating a 3D character - part 3

  12. Create a 3D game 'Knock the Cans'

    • Game creation - Level Designing

    • Game creation - Applying Logic to knock the can

    • Game creation - Applying Logic to knock the can

    • Game creation - Prefab creation & Instantiation

    • Game creation - Create a win or lose system in the game
targetAudiences: Students & working professionals keen on learning Game development with Unity

courseDetails.title: Certified Financial Analyst Professional
courseDetails.shortDescription: CFAP
courseDetails.longDescription:
Financial Analysis Assessment:

The Financial Analysis Assessment is designed to evaluate participants’ knowledge and skills in various areas of financial analysis. This assessment is suitable for finance professionals, business students, and individuals interested in assessing their proficiency in financial analysis.

The assessment covers key topics such as financial modelling, ratio analysis, risk analysis, and valuation techniques. Participants will be tested on their ability to interpret financial statements, analyze financial data, and make informed decisions based on financial information.

Through this assessment, participants can identify areas where they excel and areas that require improvement in their financial analysis skills. It provides an opportunity to gauge their understanding of financial concepts and their ability to apply them in practical scenarios.

The assessment consists of multiple-choice questions, quantitative exercises, and case studies that simulate real-world financial analysis situations. Participants will be challenged to demonstrate their analytical thinking, problem-solving skills, and ability to interpret financial data accurately.

Upon completion of the assessment, participants will receive feedback on their performance, highlighting their strengths and areas for improvement. This feedback can be used to guide further learning and development in financial analysis.

Whether you are seeking to assess your own financial analysis skills or evaluate the proficiency of your team members, the Financial Analysis Assessment provides a valuable tool to gauge knowledge and competence in this critical area of business.

Take the Financial Analysis Assessment and gain insights into your financial analysis capabilities to enhance your decision-making abilities and contribute to the financial success of your organization.
targetAudiences: Finance professionals looking to enhance their financial analysis skills
Professionals in non-finance roles (marketing, sales, operations) seeking to understand and apply financial analysis principles
Students studying finance or business wanting to gain practical knowledge of financial analysis
Anyone interested in learning about financial analysis and its application in decision making
